Alpha 03

By Involts
Posted Mar 2, 2022

Alpha 0.3 update #

Bug Fixes #

  • Fixed the Antivirus software especially Windows defender flags it as a Win32/Persistence.OR!ml
  • Fixed the Home Screen not Centered.

Features #

  • Added Thank you when the app is first shown
  • Updated Help with pictures
  • Added About Screen
  • Updated Error Dialogs
  • Updated Backuping You're World Dialog dark mode by default
  • Check and guess what type of edition is your world is (BETA)
